overview: Hua Mingxuan, a college student with super powers that is different from ordinary people, does not fit in on campus. School flower Zhao Mengjie fell in love with this handsome man and launched a strong pursuit of him. Zhao Mengjie's rich second On behalf of the hair is small - Du Han pursues Le Man who is quiet and elegant in appearance, but in fact has a rough personality, but he is still not as good as Le Man's discernment. In order to catch up with Le Man, he discovered Hua Mingxuan's superpowers, so he took Hua Mingxuan as his teacher, and Hua Mingxuan met the beautiful girl "Shi Shi" who had the same super power as himself. His own background and the mysterious organization behind the girl.

production_companies.name: Qingdao Xinnuanhuakai Film and Television Culture Media Co., Ltd.

title: Magical Campus Boy
